Uses of Package
org.mokai.action

Packages that use org.mokai.action
org.mokai.action   
 

Classes in org.mokai.action used by org.mokai.action
AddPrefixAction
          An action that adds a prefix to a string if the string doesn't starts with the prefix.
AddSpacesAction
          An action that fills a string with spaces until the string is of the specified length.
AddSuffixAction
          An action that adds a suffix to a string if the string doesn't ends with the suffix.
ConcatAction
          An action that concats multiple fields in a new field.
CopyAction
          Copies the value of a property into another property
JsonParserAction
           
RemoveAction
          An action that removes a field from a message (if it exists).
ReplaceAction
          An action that replaces strings on a field.
UpdateAction
          An action that adds or updates a field in a message.
